fullDescription.intro:
This node allows to process input tables by means of a Matlab-snippet. First the input is converted into a matlab-dataset ("dataset" is part of the Statistics Toolbox!). It's variable name is "kIn". Next the script is executed. KNIME takes the output from the script from the mOut variable which is converted back from the MATLAB dataset into a Knime-table.
Make sure that mpicbg-matlab is running somewhere, and Knime is accordingly configured (Knime->Preferences).
Detailed documentation about the scripting integration:
MPI-CBG SWEG Wiki

ports.inPort: The dat which matlab should process
ports.outPort: The results of the matlab-snippet converted back into table.
